sentences.sContent: The town is cut off from contact with the outside world.
sentences.sCn: 小镇与外界的联系被切断了。

sentences.sContent: Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any queries.
sentences.sCn: 你如果有任何疑问，尽管和我联系。

sentences.sContent: ...Anyone interested or intend to inquire about please do not feel hesitated to contact Xiao Li...
...don’t hesitate to contact me...
...My contact number is 1513729xxxx...
...New research shows that dogs limit their eye contact with angry humans...
...Many more people with HSAM started to contact researchers due to the mass media...
...Please contact me by telephone before visit...
...please do not hesitate to contact me...
...emergency workers have made contact with the miners via a radio...
...And then we'll contact you...
...Relationships in the real world are maintained through human contact and spending time with each other instead of chitchatting online...
...pale creatures who can't make eye contact and has a girlfriend who lives only in thevirtual world...
...we could contact people to share a great deal of information from anywhere at anytime...
...It is no doubt that face-to-face contact is inevitably impaired by electronic communication in the era of Internet...
...She thinks that she may have to contact the Occupational Safety and Health Administration and asked that government agency to inspect the department...
...social contact can boost development of the brain and immune system...
...Our ancestral selves miss the natural world and long for contact with non-human life...
...Even problems with crime and aggressive behaviour are reduced when there is contact with the natural world...
...Yet one study after another indicates that contact with nature gives huge benefits to ADHD children...
...Have you had any contact with Japan...
...so I know who to contact to get something done...

phrases.pCn: 联系我们；联络我们；联系方式
v. 接触到；联系；开始做某事
接触（接点）电阻；瞬变电阻

remMethod.val: con(共同) ＋ tact(接触) → 接触； 联系

trans.tranOther: communication with a person, organization, country etc
to write to or telephone someone
